account_id.description: The ID of the account that the card should be issued against. Filterable.

card_controls.description: An object that defines rules for how this card can be used

card_product_id.description: The ID of the card product that this card should be issued from

creation_options.description: An object that defines additional fields for card customization on creation

name_line_one.description: Specifies the first line of personalized text that appears on the card. (max 21 characters)

name_line_two.description: Specifies the second line of personalized text that appears on the card. (max 21 characters)

cvv.description: The 3-digit card verification code. Note this field will return null unless the `show_cvv` query parameter is set

expiration.description: The card expiration year and month, in MMYY format

fulfillment.description: Information about the card's fulfillment process

last4.description: Last 4 digits of the card number. Filterable.

new_pan_from_card_id.description: The ID of a card to reissue. If this field is entered a new card will be created without pin, a new PAN, CVV and expiration

pan.description: The primary 16-digit card number. Note this field will return null unless the `show_pan` parameter is set

person_id.description: The ID of the person representing the cardholder that this card will be issued to. Filterable.

pin_is_set.description: Reflects whether the user has set a PIN on the card; initially false

reissue_pan_from_card_id.description: The ID of a card to reissue. If this field is entered a new card will be created with the same PAN and pin, but new CVV and expiration.

show_cvv.description: When true, the `cvv` field will be returned with non-null data. False by default. Requires PCI compliance.

show_pan.description: When true, the `pan` field will be returned with non-null data. False by default. Requires PCI compliance.

parameters.description: ID of the Card to retrieve

basic_secret.description: First value in `base64(basic_user:basic_secret)`, sent as Authorization for request validation. This will appear as `<encrypted value>` in all responses, for security

basic_user.description: First value in `base64(basic_user:basic_secret)`, sent as Authorization for request validation

url.description: The HTTPS URL that will respond to the card auth message

url.description: The HTTPS URL that will respond to the card auth message

userdata.description: Arbitrary data the user can attach

amount.description: Amount of money related to the event, with two decimal precision

approved_amount.description: Approved amount of money related to the event, with two decimal precision

atm.description: Object representing data related to ATM transactions

bank_id.description: ID of the bank associated with the card event

card_id.description: The ID of the card associated with the event. Filterable.

decline_reason.description: The reason denied requests were not approved

merchant.description: Object representing the merchant where the card event occurred

message_type.description: Type of message. See Message Types

network.description: Card network the event occurred on (e.g., `mastercard`)

network_created_at.description: Timestamp of when the network states the event was created. This should match closely to the standard created_at field on the object. It may differ slightly due to the amount of time it takes Treasury Prime to process the event

networkdata.description: Information received from the network. The structure of this information depends on the processor, but may contain information such as amount, fees, or additional information about the transaction

org_id.description: ID of the organization associated with the card event

status.description: Status of event. One of `pending`, `error`, `approved`, `denied`, `timeout`, or `received`

trace_id.description: Identifier used to link card events to transactions. Filterable.

amount.description: Amount of money related to the event, with two decimal precision

approved_amount.description: Approved amount of money related to the event, with two decimal precision

atm.description: Object representing data related to ATM transactions

card_id.description: The ID of the card associated with the event. Filterable.

trace_id.description: Identifier used to link card events to transactions. Filterable.

card_auth_loop_endpoint_id.description: The ID of the Card Auth Loop Endpoint object to be used to approve or reject a card transaction

card_back_image_file_id.description: The ID of a File object containing the image defining the design for the back of the card, if applicable

card_controls.description: An object that defines rules for how this card can be used

card_front_image_file_id.description: The ID of a File object containing the image defining the design for the front of the card, if applicable

configuration.description: An object defining additional card configuration

card_id.description: The ID of the card object the token is associated with. Filterable.

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the object was created

device.description: An object that defines additional fields for the device that initiated tokenization

device_id.description: A unique identifier of the device

ip_address.description: The IP address of the device

location.description: Approximate latitude and longitude coordinates of the device

phone_number.description: The last four numbers of the device's telephone number

type.description: The type of the device. Can be one of `mobile_phone`, `watch`, `tablet`, `unknown`

fulfillment.description: An object that defines additional fields for fulfillment of the token

status.description: The status of the token. One of: `active`, `requested`, `request_declined`, `suspended`, `terminated`. Filterable.

token_service_provider.description: An object that defines additional fields for requestor of the token

network.description: The card network the tokenization occurred on. Can be one of `visa`, `mastercard`, or `unknown.

pan_reference_id.description: A unique identifier of digital wallet token PAN

token_pan_last4.description: Last 4 of the digital wallet token PAN

token_reference_id.description: The unique identifier of the digital wallet token

token_requestor_id.description: Unique numerical identifier of the digital wallet token requestor within the card network. These IDs map to a `token_requestor_name`

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the object was updated
